title: Filters
description: A filter defines an expression that you can use across multiple features.
cfExtendedDescription: Currently, the only API that uses filters is the [Firewall Rules API](#firewall-rules). For more information, refer to [Manage firewall rules via the APIs](https://developers.cloudflare.com/firewall/api/).

links.title: Get filters
links.description: Fetches filters in a zone. You can filter the results using several optional parameters.

id.description: The unique identifier of the filter.

paused.description: When true, indicates that the filter is currently paused.

expression.description: A case-insensitive string to find in the expression.

description.description: A case-insensitive string to find in the description.

ref.description: The filter ref (a short reference tag) to search for. Must be an exact match.

links.title: Get a filter
links.description: Fetches the details of a filter.

links.title: Create filters
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/filters" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '[{"id":"372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b61","expression":"(http.request.uri.path ~ \".*wp-login.php\" or http.request.uri.path ~ \".*xmlrpc.php\") and ip.addr ne 172.16.22.155","paused":false,"description":"Restrict access from these browsers on this address range.","ref":"FIL-100"}]'

id.description: The unique identifier of the filter.

expression.description: The filter expression. For more information, refer to [Expressions](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ruleset-engine/rules-language/expressions/).

paused.description: When true, indicates that the filter is currently paused.

description.example: "Restrict access from these browsers on this address range."
description.description: An informative summary of the filter.

ref.description: A short reference tag. Allows you to select related filters.

parameters.example:
{
  "id": "372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b61",
  "expression": "(http.request.uri.path ~ \".*wp-login.php\" or http.request.uri.path ~ \".*xmlrpc.php\") and ip.addr ne 172.16.22.155",
  "paused": false,
  "description": "Restrict access from these browsers on this address range.",
  "ref": "FIL-100"
}

links.title: Update filters
links.description: Updates one or more existing filters.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/filters" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \

links.title: Delete filters
links.description: Deletes one or more existing filters.

id.description: The unique identifier of the filter.
